meanings.definition: The process of reaching thermal equilibrium.
meanings.sent1: During the thermalization of the water, it gradually reached the same temperature as its surroundings.
meanings.sent2: The thermalization of the room took some time as the heater slowly warmed up the space.
meanings.sent3: The thermalization of the ice cream made it melt perfectly for the sundae.
meanings.sent4: The thermalization of the colors in the painting created a harmonious blend.
meanings.sent5: The thermalization of the metal turned it from cold to warm in my hand.

meanings.definition: The act of heating or cooling a substance to a desired temperature.
meanings.sent1: The thermalization of the soup made it just the right temperature to eat.
meanings.sent2: In the lab, the thermalization of the chemicals was crucial for the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The thermalization of the cake batter was done carefully to avoid overcooking.
meanings.sent4: The thermalization of the room made it comfortable for everyone inside.
meanings.sent5: The thermalization of the tea brought out its full flavor.
